# nonSpatial

**Type Property**

A non-spatial video configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
static var nonSpatial: AVSpatialVideoConfiguration { get }
```

## Creating a configuration

- **init()**: Initializes an AVSpatialVideoConfiguration instance with all the properties set to nil.
- **init(formatDescription:)**: Initializes an AVSpatialVideoConfiguration with a format description.
